description: The MainActivity.kt file contains the implementation of the main activity for a Tic Tac Toe game on Android. It manages the game board UI, game state, player turns, scoring, game logic for win/draw detection, and user interactions such as resetting the game.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity class for the Tic Tac Toe game, responsible for rendering the game board, handling user interactions, managing game state, and updating the UI accordingly.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, binds UI components, sets up event listeners, and prepares the game board.

methods.name: styleCell
methods.description: Configures the visual style and accessibility properties of each game cell button.

methods.name: onCellClicked
methods.description: Handles user clicks on game cells, updates the game state, and checks for game outcomes.

methods.name: togglePlayer
methods.description: Switches the current player between 'X' and 'O'.

methods.name: updateTurnIndicator
methods.description: Updates the UI element showing which player's turn it is.

methods.name: updateScore
methods.description: Updates the score display on the UI.

methods.name: onGameOver
methods.description: Handles end-of-game UI updates based on the game result.

methods.name: newRound
methods.description: Resets the game board for a new round while maintaining scores.

methods.name: highlightCells
methods.description: Highlights the winning line on the game board.

methods.name: checkGameState
methods.description: Determines if the game has been won, tied, or should continue.

methods.name: findWinningLine
methods.description: Identifies the indices of the winning line if a player has won.
